name: SuperShot (Kosmosael)
description:
SuperShot

Delaying the inevitable: vengeful droids shooting bullets at you to terminate you!

Sometimes, inaction can let you prepare for the inevitable.

Read your mysterious' guide messages to find a way of beating the level.

Through various levels you'll be welcomed by those (strangely reminding yourself) cyborgs (or was it droids?).

You can't trust your eyes, many things can fool you.

Features:

  • Bullet time action!

  • Dashing player (WOW)

  • Best IA ever made

  • Awesome sound effects

  • Quality music

Controls:

  • Left/Right/Up/Down | W/A/S/D: Move

  • Space: DASH

Technicals

  • Game engine: Godot 3.4.4

  • Musics/effects: Ableton 11 live studio

  • Sprites: Aseprite

First game jam, first game made, hope you enjoy it!

This game is SUPER inspired by SuperHot, a really awesome 3D/VR game.
